de.must.middle
Class ParametersFromPropertyFilesStd

java.lang.Object
  de.must.middle.ParametersFromPropertyFilesStd
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParameterStore
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParametersFromPropertyFiles
public abstract class ParametersFromPropertyFilesStd
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParameterStore

Container for parameters, stored in property files. Differentiates between default (admin) parameters and personal parameters.
